mapper.select: SELECT /* selectAncmQnaList */ a.qstn_seq , a.titl , a.ancm_yn , a.reg_id , a.reg_dtm FROM co_qna_mst a WHERE ANCM_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY a.REG_DTM DESC

SELECT /* selectQnaList */ A.* FROM ( SELECT a.qstn_seq , a.titl , a.reg_id , a.reg_dtm FROM co_qna_mst a
ORDER BY a.REG_DTM DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage} ) A
SELECT /* selectQnaListTotCnt */ COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT FROM co_qna_mst a
